title: Human Fast Food
description:
A cooking simulator where you run an underground fast food for monsters and serve them with human meat. Improve your kitchen appliances, unlock new recipes, manage your stock and keep the monsters well fed.
GET ORDERS – Write down the most varied requests for even more varied monsters . PROCESSS MEAT – Grind up the humans and turn them into prime meat. SHAPE THE MEAT – Shape the meat into a variety of dishes. COOK – Prepare the food but be careful not to burn it! SERVE – Serve customers and collect your profit. BrokenLore: DON’T WATCH

system_requirements.Processor: Intel Core i5 or AMD equivalent younger than 10 years
